verbs.description: President Trump and Kim Jong Un [V: have] met in Singapore , shaking hands at the start of an unprecedented summit that carries the weight of the world ’s expectations .

[ARG0: President Trump and Kim Jong Un] have [V: met] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] , [ARGM-ADV: shaking hands at the start of an unprecedented summit that carries the weight of the world ’s expectations] .
[ARG0: President Trump and Kim Jong Un] have met in Singapore , [V: shaking] [ARG1: hands] [ARGM-TMP: at the start of an unprecedented summit that carries the weight of the world ’s expectations] .
President Trump and Kim Jong Un have met in Singapore , shaking hands at the start of [ARG0: an unprecedented summit] [R-ARG0: that] [V: carries] [ARG1: the weight of the world ’s expectations] .
